# HUD::SET_BLIP_SHOW_CONE

## Summary
If this blip is attached to a ped then a cone will be drawn on the map to show the ped's perception range

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blipIndex
* **BOOL** showCone
* **INT** hudColor = 11

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
As of b2189, the third parameter sets the color of the cone (before b2189 it was ignored). Note that it uses HUD colors, not blip colors.
